movies.title: Be My Slave
movies.plot: Be My Slave is a sexually-themed Japanese movie directed by Toru Kamei and based on a novel by Shu Satami. It was released by Kadokawa Pictures in Japan on November 3, 2012. In the film, Hiroaki Mayama plays a publishing company employee who's attracted to his senior coworker Kana (Mitsu Dan), a woman who seems to have a nice, clean image while also giving off a certain air of mystery. After several failed attempts to hit on her, he suddenly gets an unexpected text message from her bluntly stating "Let's have sex tonight". He wonders what brought this on so suddenly, but the chance to be with an unattainable woman drives him to show up at her house. However, when he arrives, he finds a suspicious DVD and witnesses the shocking sexual life she's been leading in secret-one which he will soon become a part of himself.

biography.bio: Mitsu Dan is an actress, known for Be My Slave (2012), Arasaachan mushûsei (2014) and Akumu no roku 6 gô shitsu (2013).
biography.name: Mitsu Dan

biography.bio: Itsuji Itao was born on July 18, 1963 in Osaka, Japan. He is known for his work on Tokyo Gore Police (2008), Air Doll (2009) and Why Don't You Play in Hell? (2013).
biography.name: Itsuji Itao

biography.bio: Hiroaki Mayama is an actor, known for Be My Slave (2012).
biography.name: Hiroaki Mayama

biography.bio: Kanji Furutachi was born in 1968 in Sakai, Japan. He is an actor, known for Au revoir l'été (2013), Hospitalité (2010) and GFP Bunny (2012).
biography.name: Kanji Furutachi

biography.bio: Asuka Ishii is an actress, known for Battle Royale II (2003), Shaolin Girl (2008) and Animusu anima (2005).
biography.name: Asuka Ishii

biography.bio: Ken Kaito is an actor, known for Mura no shashinshuu (2004), Umizaru (2004) and Chaos Legion (2003).
biography.name: Ken Kaito

biography.bio: Ini Kusano is an actor, known for Ain't No Tomorrows (2008), Shizumanu taiyô (2016) and Minami-kun no Koibito (2015).
biography.name: Ini Kusano

biography.bio: Michié is an actress, known for Silence (2016), The Most Beautiful Night in the World (2008) and Dawn of the Felines (2017).
biography.name: Michié

biography.bio: Nahana is an actress, known for The Grudge 2 (2006), Suicide Club (2001) and Happy Ending (2009).
biography.name: Nahana

biography.bio: Misaki Saijô is an actress, known for Hakujitsumu (2009), Space Battleship Yamato (2010) and Be My Slave (2012).
biography.name: Misaki Saijô

biography.bio: Aya Sugimoto was born on July 19, 1968 in Sakyo-ku, Kyoto City, Kyoto, Japan as Motoe Matsuyama. She is an actress, known for Flower and Snake (2004), Ai no shinsekai (1994) and Flower & Snake II (2005). She has been married to unknown since April 17, 2011. She was previously married to Toshinori Numata.
biography.name: Aya Sugimoto

biography.bio: Taiji Takamastu is an actor, known for Be My Slave (2012).
biography.name: Taiji Takamastu

biography.bio: Takaki Uda is an actor and writer, known for The Ramen Girl (2008), United Red Army (2007) and Lost Paradise in Tokyo (2009).
biography.name: Takaki Uda

biography.bio: Tomoyo Uesugi is an actress, known for Be My Slave (2012).
biography.name: Tomoyo Uesugi
